confirm_complete: Are you sure you want to calculate?
please_click_symbol_or_number: click on the symbols or number below
step_three_hint: After completion, the score will be updated on the leaderboard.
introduce_page_1_desc: The game is divided into three stages: symbols, numbers, and combinations. Utilizing the selected symbols and numbers to form logical equations, players aim to achieve the highest score and compete against players worldwide!
introduce_page_2_desc: Each grid will randomly generate one of the four arithmetic symbols: addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division. Please choose three grids out of the nine, and proceed to the next stage.
introduce_page_3_desc: Each grid will randomly generate one number between -9 and 9. Please choose three grids out of the nine, and proceed to the next stage.
introduce_page_4_desc: Using the symbols and numbers drawn in the first two stages, form logical equations to obtain results, which will then be updated onto the score. This will impact rankings and achievements.
introduce_page_5_helper_text: Once the name is confirmed, it cannot be changed.
modal_restart_desc: Are you sure you want to watch the advertisement and restart?
